verses.verse: God <S%H430><s%> stands <S%H5324><s%> in the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the mighty <S%H410><s%>; he judges <S%H8199><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%>.
How long will you judge <S%H8199><s%> unjustly <S%H5766><s%>, and accept <S%H5375><s%> the persons <S%H6440><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>? Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
Defend <S%H8199><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%> and fatherless <S%H3490><s%>: do justice <S%H6663><s%> to the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H7326><s%>.
Deliver <S%H6403><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>: rid <S%H5337><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.

They know <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H995><s%>, neither will they understand; they walk <S%H1980><s%> on in darkness <S%H2825><s%>: all the foundations <S%H4144><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> are out of course <S%H4131><s%>.
I have said <S%H559><s%>, You are gods <S%H430><s%>; and all of you are sons <S%H1121><s%> of the most High <S%H5945><s%>.
But <S%H403><s%> you shall die <S%H4191><s%> like men <S%H120><s%>, and fall <S%H5307><s%> like one <S%H259><s%> of the princes <S%H8269><s%>.
Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>: for you shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> all nations <S%H1471><s%>.
